• Dashor App

Employees {{myHeader}}

A geospatial map showing the number of employees at various locations around the country.

  • Leaflet.js
  • Mapbox API

Key Metrics

A metrics view showing number of opened issues, reported issues, and paying customers.

  • Chart.js
  • Angular-Chart.js

Data View

A 'data-tables' view showing a list of all current open and closed issues, customers, and employees.

  • Smart-Table.js
